reviews.review_msg: She literally made me hate Physics this semester. I wont be taking with her again. I took PHY140 with her because i saw the rating on this website i am regretting. Do not take with her. Too much homework.

She is a solid prof that explains concepts well, her midterms are heavily based on prelectures, reports, and assignments. The only criticism I levy against her is the large proportion of assignments required to be finished. I tried to finish them ASAP at the beginning of the semester but it was a lost cause. So I used it as finals practise instead.
she's great do remember to do the prelecture in advance so you can follow her

Amazingly fun professor, teaches materials really well, and is really good at explaining everything including questions you might have. Uses sarcasm and sometimes jokes a little to cheer up the class. As long a you pay attention. She's more then alright. 10/10 would take again if I had a chance to.  But if you skip class. You won't pass.
